Theming your shiny

Source: vignettes/articles/theming.Rmd
theming.Rmd

Theming in OmopViewer shiny apps is done using brand.yml, that will rely on a _brand.yml file written in the root of your shiny project. That _brand.yml file customises your shiny app colour and also the tables and plots created using visOmopresults. The package has some predefined themes, some come from the visOmopResults package and some others defined here in OmopViewer.

visOmopResults
darwin
default
OmopViewer
empty
ohdsi
sad_robot
scarlet

Predefined themes

See our predefined themes:
